title: Obim34
author: Obim34
content: Many person has several patterns and ween to several areas at which favors them where else becomes the other way round for another.Many believes hardwork drives one into light but it can be contradicting as hell cos in this present era it becomes more of being smart than hardwork.Doing more of hard work than working smart will get you to a certain level of achievement where applying more knowledge and critical skills would amount to greater achievementsWe all set goals and apply certain strategies to get there, can be of the same goal but different strategies. The smartest gets better result than the one who only believes in his ability, knowing is not enough but smartness in applying what is known is needed for better achievement.In doing Bitcoin we should be smart enough to study the market and manage speculationsThere are few factors that makes a person smart, considering:Inquisitiveness : Having this mindset of wanting and willing to learn is one attribute to being smart, a smart person never sees things as common, always curious to learn. They say "Learning never ends", and  "No acquired Knowledge is a waste" Sensitive to better ideas : There is, well a need to be sensitive. When in the midst of good speakers, paying good attention to the speaker so as to grab good ideas that can be relatably used, can be on a face to face level or through the media Asking questions : After listening to good speakers, there must be something shady and not completely comprehended but the curiosity to ask question for a clear picture is also attributed to being smart, as they say "A problem known, is a problem solved"

comments.author: iBaba
comments.body: It is better to work smartly than to work yourself out. Most of the time, people who work smartly give the best results and also enjoy a long-lasting work relationship than those who work hard, "under duress" to impress the employer.On the other hand, do not allow yourself to be over used under any working environment. I am always careful and scared of working in a toxic environment where people are treated with little or no respect. I was gisting with a colleague at work earlier today about this topic. Despite that we work on the same place, some of us are treated with less respect than others. For instance, the same company paid for al my flights and other travel expenses but could not pay for the other persons. And the obvious reason was because the guys didn't work smartly and only decide to work hard. I work less and more comfortable with more pay than the other guys are paid less with less opportunity.

comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on October 14, 2023, 10:33:18 PMI do really think, the term hard work means different thing to different persons but as you have outlined it is best to use strategy to achieve amazing things which would have taking forever to achieve. If everyone realize this and start working towards achieving great goals through well organized strategy, they would have gone far beyond their current state. The problem with some person is that they are stereotype and are not ready to adjust to new idea. I have observed some business men/women and I have found they are not growing their business even when their shop look loaded. Can you imagine someone having one store for 10years? Though he maybe making profit but the business has failed to grow There are people who engaged in business to earn a living, for survival and not having this basic knowledge to extend or grow. As long they're earning from it daily and utilizing the profits made to solved their problems and pay bills, they're okay. While the intellectual business individuals that are desperate for success, they dream beyond the normal level and grow their business from one level to another. Being smart and working hard appear similar but differ in meaning. An entrepreneur is smart enough to build a business to a high level, but he is not industrious enough to ensure his ultimate goals are accomplished. A trader, on the other hand, can be diligent enough to update his firm, but he lacks the smart capabilities to reach these top levels. The main point is absolutely possessing these two attributes, smart and hardwork, things will work out smoothly for you. Opening and growing a business store is not an easy undertaking; business owners are well aware of the difficulties encountered in the business world. We only focus on the positive aspects of business, completely neglecting the ups and downs.

comments.author: DubemIfedigbo001
comments.body: Well said OP, the era of working hard has ended a long time ago. In this era and with the level and direction things are heading to, anybody working just hard will not make much dividends from his  hard work. Smart work is the act of working with information that boosts activity, helps you stay on the spotlight and driving very much patronage without working so hard. This might include the use of digital media to project your business so you'll reach out to diverse clients. Another is the use of competent machinery to boost production effectiveness and decrease fault rates. For example. I went to a computer engineer's office and was surprised to see that he now uses a microscope to view faults on the motherboard. Also he has now a machine that reads the motherboard and detects where the faults are located. He now  just use the  microscope to view that section, fix it at a much shorter time thereby attending to more jobs at the same time  frame others attend to not up to 1/3 of his job schedule. I was even more impressed to see that other engineers come to use his machines when he's off them at a significant charge. So he now makes money from two angles in the same business.In conclusion, working smart pays more than working hard cos you're well informed of the ways to maximize your potentials.
